scripts.generate-http: rm -rf dist_http && openapi-generator generate -i ./swagger/charger_spots.yml -g dart --model-name-prefix=API -o dist_http
scripts.generate-dio: rm -rf dist_dio && openapi-generator generate -i ./swagger/charger_spots.yml -g dart-dio --model-name-prefix=API -o dist_dio && cd dist_dio && flutter pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
